name: Z Saiyan Warriors: Revenge
description:
Brand-new Model, Unique Development
The game introduced a brand new exploration feature, plus a unique card development mode. It brings a brand new experience, and also allows you to gain a unique sense of accomplishment during the development process.

Full Screen Burst, Unlimited Combo
The extremely spectacular images in the alien world, the full-screen ultimate and the free combat mode will bring you with an unprecedented refreshing and intense combat experience. Come and experience it together!

Better Warrior Development
The development of warriors and gears can significantly improve your gaming experience, bringing you a unique sense of accomplishment.
